memberdef.argsstring: (const QColor &color=DEFAULT_SIMPLEFILL_COLOR, const QColor &color2=Qt::white, GradientColorType gradientColorType=SimpleTwoColor, GradientType gradientType=Linear, GradientCoordinateMode coordinateMode=Feature, GradientSpread gradientSpread=Pad)
memberdef.name: QgsGradientFillSymbolLayer

briefdescription.para: Shall be reimplemented by subclasses to create a deep copy of the instance.
Color for endpoint of gradient, only used if the gradient color type is set to SimpleTwoColor.
Returns the color ramp used for the gradient fill.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the gradient color type is set to ColorRamp.
setColorRamp()
gradientColorType()

briefdescription.para: Coordinate mode for gradient. Controls how the gradient stops are positioned.
Returns the estimated maximum distance which the layer style will bleed outside the drawn shape when drawn in the specified /a context.

detaileddescription.para: For example, polygons drawn with an stroke will draw half the width of the stroke outside of the polygon. This amount is estimated, since it may be affected by data defined symbology rules.

briefdescription.para: Gradient color mode, controls how gradient color stops are created.
Gradient spread mode. Controls how the gradient behaves outside of the predefined stops.
Type of gradient, e.g., linear or radial.
Returns a string that represents this layer type.

detaileddescription.para: Used for serialization. Should match with the string used to register this symbol layer in the registry.

briefdescription.para: Returns the units to use for sizes and widths within the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Individual symbol layer subclasses will interpret this in different ways, e.g., a marker symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the marker size, while a line symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the line width.
output unit, or QgsUnitTypes::RenderUnknownUnit if the symbol layer contains mixed units
setOutputUnit()

briefdescription.para: Should be reimplemented by subclasses to return a string map that contains the configuration information for the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to serialize a symbol layer perstistently.

briefdescription.para: Sets the color ramp used for the gradient fill.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the gradient color type is set to ColorRamp.
ramp
color ramp. Ownership is transferred.
colorRamp()
setGradientColorType()

briefdescription.para: Offset for gradient fill.
Units for gradient fill offset.
Sets the units to use for sizes and widths within the symbol layer.

detaileddescription.para:
Individual symbol layer subclasses will interpret this in different ways, e.g., a marker symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the marker size, while a line symbol layer may use it to specify the units for the line width.
unit
output units
outputUnit()

briefdescription.para: Starting point of gradient fill, in the range [0,0] - [1,1].
Sets the starting point of the gradient to be the feature centroid.
End point of gradient fill, in the range [0,0] - [1,1].
Sets the end point of the gradient to be the feature centroid.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsSymbolRenderContext &context, QBrush &brush, const QColor &color, const QColor &color2, GradientColorType gradientColorType, QgsColorRamp *gradientRamp, GradientType gradientType, GradientCoordinateMode coordinateMode, GradientSpread gradientSpread, QPointF referencePoint1, QPointF referencePoint2, double angle)
memberdef.name: applyGradient

briefdescription.para: Applies the gradient to a brush.
Rotates a reference point by a specified angle around the point (0.5, 0.5)
